'China using these gadgets to spy on Americans', says FCC; issues security notice
description: The FCC has issued a national security notice, warning that Chinese electronics pose a surveillance and security threat to Americans. Millions of prohibited product listings, including security cameras and smartwatches from companies like Huawei and Hikvision, have been removed from US retail platforms. This action is part of Washington's ongoing crackdown on Chinese technology firms due to national security concerns.

title: Jaz Elle’s one-word reply melts hearts on Agassi’s iconic style
description: Tennis icon Andre Agassi, fresh off leading Team World to victory at the 2025 Laver Cup, delighted fans with a throwback post of his iconic 80s and 90s fashion. His daughter, Jaz Elle Agassi, praised his "Majestic" style. Agassi also shared his competitive spirit as captain, calling the win a "special week."

title: 'Indians' success in US no conspiracy': Zoho's Sridhar Vembu
description: Zoho CEO Sridhar Vembu explains why Indian professionals dominate American technology leadership, attributing it to unintended consequences of the H-1B visa and green card system. The lengthy immigration process made job switching risky, creating committed long-term employees who naturally earned promotions. Vembu emphasises R&D success requires time-intensive commitment, not just funding. His comments come amid controversy over Trump's proposed $100,000 H-1B fee.

title: Microsoft engineer quits after 13 years; sends resignation email to employees
description: A senior Microsoft engineer has resigned protesting the company's cloud contracts with the Israeli military. Scott Sutfin-Glowski cited enabling potential atrocities as his reason for leaving. This follows months of internal dissent and employee firings over Gaza-related demonstrations. Microsoft previously stopped some services to an Israeli intelligence unit after a report. However, many contracts remain active, and employee protests continue. Activists demand a complete cut of ties with Israel.
